name: Quick Waffles
directions: Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl.
In another bowl, whisk milk, melted butter, eggs, and vanilla until smooth.
Pour wet mixture into dry ingredients and stir just until combined.
Lightly grease waffle iron with butter or cooking spray.
Add about 1/3 cup (80 ml) batter per waffle, adjusting for your waffle maker.
Cook until golden brown and crisp, 2â€“3 minutes per batch.
Place cooked waffles on a wire rack to keep them crisp.
Serve warm with butter, maple syrup, or desired toppings.
